channel.title: Edward Atkin's Blog
channel.description: I am starting a blog to write about pointless anecdotes, mundane things and random musings. It will have some pictures. I hope you like it.

item.title: In Which I Discuss Multiple Failed Attempts At Making Websites
item.description: This website isn't my first rodeo. Or my second. Or my third. I think it's probably my 6th or so? So let's talk about some internet history that surely nobody w...

item.title: In Which I Discuss My Alcoholism
item.description: Often when you think of alcoholics, you think of the people who are drinking in Wetherspoons (a cheap British pub chain for the uninitiated) at 7am. You think o...

item.title: In Which I Break Free From My Sister's Banana Boycott
item.description: I was the younger sibling in my household, thus, I had the tendancy to copy what my older sister did. I used to eat bananas, until one day, she said she hated b...

item.title: In Which I Reminisce About The Early Days Of The Internet
item.description: Remember the internet? Back when everything was less centralised, and things looked worse. I spend most of my time on Discord and Reddit now, never leaving much...
